name: Test (Elisebeth)
description:
KNOWN ERRORS: 

> Typo of 'to' when talking to Razz ('ot' instead).

> Deems/Aria dialogue for the frog, even if Zane is the player.

> Dialogue in locked room repeats itself each time you go over the panel. Need to add Self Switch to stop.

> Yuuto may not walk directionally when he enters the scene.

> Payne can't join the Everyone Gang anymore.

3-26 Devlog:

Small Bug Fixes.

Names above characters no longer grows/shrinks when hovered over (but if I could make the color change when hovered, that'd be nice.

Added Quests:

- Eeeevil Party [Name VERY subject to change, but I can't think of anything right now]:  Lemonsworth/Aria quest. Only started the initial talks. Might entirely scrap later, but I like the idea of throwing a party to try to invite two rivals for how stupid it is. Currently, there are two Objectives: Find a cake (likely through Payne) and find party games (no clue who). End of the quest would probably be the characters still not showing up, because they're not part of Art Fight. Ends with them screaming at the screen to add their rivals to Art Fight? (Richie comes in at the end too, talking about his Best Friend, WHO WAS REMOVED. OH NO).

Completed Quests:

- When Life Gives you Lemons... :  Very quick quest that consists of merely talking to Lemonsworth with Zane once. He receives a lemon from him, but only because Lemonsworth finds him unstable.

Added Dialogue: 

- Bard Band: Added Echidna as a member.

- Everyone Gang: Added Echidna, Typhon, Lemonsworth, Jean, and Ruby as members. (Seven down, thirty to go? Why do I do this to myself?) Jean should be able to join from any of his three spots, but hopefully it doesn't mess with the other dialogue anywhere. Sometimes, other dialogue will trigger first, like the puppet quest.

- Zane/Jean Equipment: Took out the possibility of finding a lawyer to sue Jean because Jean is in so many other places already and it'd be hard to keep track of. Instead, Zane threatens to sue and if he spoke to Susan, he'll mention Susan by name. Either way, Jean returns the equipment. Tried to add the equipment thing to all the different Jeans as well except the one in the front of the inn, but I didn't heavily playtest it.

Known Glitches:

> Need to create a Quest icon for the Seth Quest (thinking about having two people).

Controls:

X: Open Menu / Cancel 

Z: Interact / Advance Text

SHIFT: Dash / Fast Forward Text

Q: Open Quest Log

CONTROL: Switch Party, once unlocked (only in areas both parties can reach. NO SWITCHING TO ZANE AFTER CROSSING THE BRIDGE!)
